name: Re-Leafed | Game Jam Edition
description:
Disclaimer: This Is The Game Jam Edition, meaning a full and updated version is to be released. It was placed in a 21-Day game jam.

Re-Leafed is an adventure platformer, your goal being to restore planet Earth to its former beauty. It has a fully developed story, telling the tell of our own planet and how you must in a sense, "Rebirth It".
